dataset_info.name: brainrot-dataset
dataset_info.description: A dataset consisting of paired examples for translating formal/standard English to 'brainrot' internet speak. Brainrot style features casual language, emojis, lowercase text, internet slang like 'fr' (for real), 'king/queen' references, and exaggerated expressions.

target.description: The transformed text in 'brainrot' internet language style
